0544002230
4000110003

Only the first 50 non white space characters are read in as bricks. For bricks: 
0 no brick, 1 no item, 2 paddle size increase, 3 one point, 4 damage, 5 health. 

Difficulties not to scale (Hard mode seems sufficiently difficult)
